services.name: Digital Transformation Consulting
services.summary: Define the right steps for your business's digital journey together. We analyze your processes and create a custom transformation roadmap.
services.description:
Discover What You Need Together

Digital transformation is not a one-size-fits-all recipe. Every business has unique needs, priorities and bottlenecks. That's why we listen first.

What Do We Do?

  • Process Analysis: We examine your current business processes on site, identify where time is lost and where information is lost.
  • Digital Transformation Roadmap: We create a step-by-step, actionable plan tailored to you. Which processes should be digitized first, which technologies work—we clarify these.
  • Technology Selection Consulting: There are dozens of solutions on the market. Which one is right for you, which is unnecessary? We determine this together.

Who Is It For?

For businesses that don't know where to start with digital transformation, aren't getting value from current technologies, or need the right strategy before investing.
services.problemsTitle: Why Digital Transformation Is No Longer Optional
services.problemsSubtitle: What successful businesses have in common: They solved these problems.

problems.title: Competitors Are Moving Faster, You're Falling Behind
problems.description: Your customer asks for a quote. You say '2-3 days.' Your competitor sends it in 10 minutes. Who gets the business? Digital systems give you speed advantage.

problems.title: You Have Data But Can't See It
problems.description: 'How much profit did we make this month?' you ask. The answer comes 3 days later in Excel. With real-time dashboards, you see data instantly and make decisions based on facts, not guesses.

problems.title: Your Team Is Drowning in Busy Work
problems.description: Sales team spends 2 hours daily on reports. Accounting manually enters invoices. Automation handles repetitive tasks. Your team focuses on what matters: customers, opportunities, growth.

problems.title: Customer Expectations Have Changed
problems.description: 10 years ago, customers waited 3 days. Today they expect instant response, immediate delivery, 24/7 access. We deliver modern customer experience: automated responses, online tracking, self-service.

services.name: Business Process Digitalization
services.summary: Leave manual work, Excel files and WhatsApp groups behind. Make your business processes fast, controllable and error-free.
services.description:
Automate Manual Tasks

Most companies grow without their systems growing. Excel spreadsheets, WhatsApp groups and manual tracking eventually trip the company up. Information is lost, work is duplicated, decisions come late.

Which Processes Do We Digitize?

  • Inventory Management: Real-time stock tracking, automatic alerts, fast reporting.
  • Customer Relationship Management (CRM): Gather customer information in one place, track sales processes, don't miss opportunities.
  • Internal Process Systems: We digitize recurring work such as HR, procurement and approval processes.
  • Form and Approval Processes: Digital forms instead of paper, automatic approval flows, instant notifications.

What's the Result?

Your teams waste less time, information isn't lost, decisions are made faster. As your company grows, the system grows with it.
services.problemsTitle: How Manual Processes Are Slowing Your Company Down
services.problemsSubtitle: What successful businesses have in common: They solved these problems.

problems.title: Everything's on WhatsApp, Nothing's on Record
problems.description: Did that order come via WhatsApp? Which group? Who approved it? 3 months later when legal issues arise, you have no proof. Digital systems track and record everything.

problems.title: Same Work Done 3 Times
problems.description: Sales enters it, accounting re-enters it, warehouse enters it again. 3 different Excel files, 3 different numbers. Instant chaos. One system, one entry, zero duplication.

problems.title: Can't Scale Because Systems Don't Scale
problems.description: Business grows but each new customer creates more chaos. Managing 10 customers vs 100 should take the same effort. Digital systems grow with you effortlessly.

problems.title: Costs Keep Rising Out of Control
problems.description: Hiring more people for every new project. Costs balloon while profit margins shrink. Digital transformation lets you do the same work with fewer resources. Lower costs, fewer errors.

services.name: AI Integration
services.summary: Make your systems intelligent with AI. Automate repetitive tasks, serve your customers 24/7, derive meaning from your data.
services.description:
Make Your Systems Intelligent

AI is no longer a future technology—it's today's competitive tool. But AI alone isn't a solution—it creates value when used in the right place for the right purpose.

What Can We Do with AI?

  • Smart Chatbots: Answer customer questions 24/7 automatically. Let AI handle repetitive questions so your team can focus on real problems.
  • Document Processing: Invoices, contracts, documents—with AI you can automatically read, categorize and process them.
  • Predictive Analytics: Get insights on sales forecasts, stock needs and customer behavior from your historical data.
  • Automatic Categorization: Incoming requests, emails, forms—automatically classified by AI and routed to the right person.

How Do We Start?

We first look at your current processes. Where AI helps and where it doesn't—we determine this together. Then we start with a small pilot, see results, and scale if needed.
services.problemsTitle: Why Your Business Needs AI Now, Not Later
services.problemsSubtitle: What successful businesses have in common: They solved these problems.

problems.title: Repetitive Tasks Waste Time
problems.description: Your skilled employees spend hours answering the same customer questions, processing similar documents, and performing routine data entry. AI can handle this instantly.

problems.title: 24/7 Customer Support Is Expensive
problems.description: Customers expect instant responses at any time. Hiring staff for round-the-clock support is costly and difficult to manage. AI provides instant support without breaks.

problems.title: Data Insights Remain Hidden
problems.description: You have mountains of data but no time to analyze it properly. AI can spot patterns, predict trends, and provide actionable insights that humans might miss.

problems.title: Manual Processing Creates Errors
problems.description: Human error in document processing, data entry, and categorization leads to mistakes that cost time and money. AI processes consistently with near-perfect accuracy.

services.name: Smart Reporting and Analytics
services.summary: You have data but can't see it. Track your business in real time with dashboards and automatic reports, make the right decisions quickly.
services.description:
See Your Data, Make Decisions

In most companies there is data but it's invisible. Numbers scattered across Excel files, manually prepared reports, analyses that take days... Result? Decisions are delayed, opportunities are missed.

What Do We Offer?

  • Real-Time Dashboards: Sales, inventory, costs, customer behavior—see it all on one screen, instantly.
  • Automatic Reports: Instead of preparing the same report by hand every week, let the system generate it for you. Delivered to your inbox, ready on your screen.
  • Data Visualization: Understandable charts, trends and comparisons instead of complex tables. Understand at a glance.
  • Performance Tracking: Team performance, sales targets, operational efficiency—we make everything measurable and trackable.

What's the Difference?

You now make decisions based on data. Instead of 'I think' or 'maybe', you say 'the data shows'. And you don't need to wait days to do it.
services.problemsTitle: Why Flying Blind Is Costing You Money
services.problemsSubtitle: What successful businesses have in common: They solved these problems.

problems.title: Reports Take Days to Prepare
problems.description: By the time your weekly or monthly report is ready, the data is already outdated. You're making decisions based on old information while the market has moved on.

problems.title: Can't Track Performance
problems.description: How is your team performing? Which products are selling? What's your profit margin? Without proper analytics, you're guessing instead of knowing.

problems.title: Data Scattered Everywhere
problems.description: Sales data in one system, inventory in another, financials in Excel. Consolidating information manually is time-consuming and error-prone.

problems.title: Missed Opportunities
problems.description: Without real-time insights, you miss trends, fail to spot problems early, and can't act fast when opportunities arise. Your competitors who can see their data clearly win.

services.name: System Improvement and Modernization
services.summary: Renew your old, slow or inefficient systems. Speed up and update your existing software so it grows with your business.
services.description:
Strengthen Your Existing Systems

Sometimes you don't need to build a system from scratch. You have an existing system but it's slow, outdated, not integrated or has security gaps. In that case the right approach is improvement and modernization.

What Kind of Improvements Do We Make?

  • Legacy System Renewal: Your 10-year-old software still runs but no longer meets today's needs. We modernize while preserving the architecture.
  • Performance Optimization: Systems slowed down? We review database queries, code structure, infrastructure—and speed everything up.
  • Solving Integration Issues: Need to integrate with accounting software, e-invoicing, CRM? We build bridges between systems.
  • Security Updates: Legacy systems can have security gaps. We bring them in line with current security standards.

Who Is It For?

You have existing software but it no longer meets your needs, runs slowly or is outdated. Instead of starting from scratch, we strengthen what you have.
services.problemsTitle: Why Your Legacy System Is Holding You Back
services.problemsSubtitle: What successful businesses have in common: They solved these problems.

problems.title: System Is Too Slow
problems.description: What used to take seconds now takes minutes. Your team wastes time waiting for pages to load and reports to generate. Slow systems kill productivity.

problems.title: Security Vulnerabilities
problems.description: Old systems weren't built with modern security threats in mind. Data breaches, ransomware attacks, and compliance issues put your business at serious risk.

problems.title: Can't Integrate with New Tools
problems.description: Your system doesn't talk to modern software. You can't connect to your accounting system, CRM, or other tools. Manual data transfer creates errors and wastes time.

problems.title: System Limits Growth
problems.description: Your current system can't handle increased load, new features, or additional users. You want to grow but your technology won't let you.

services.name: Cost Optimization
services.summary: Have your technology costs ballooned? Unnecessary spending? We analyze your systems and reduce costs while increasing efficiency.
services.description:
Lower Your Technology Costs

Many companies invest in technology but overpay unnecessarily. Unused licenses, inefficient infrastructure, unnecessary software... Result? Budget grows but efficiency doesn't.

How Do We Reduce Costs?

  • System Analysis and Improvement: We examine your systems, identify where resources are wasted and where improvements can be made.
  • Cloud Migration Consulting: Physical servers are expensive and hard to maintain. Moving to the cloud reduces cost and increases flexibility.
  • License Optimization: How many users do you have, which licenses are used, which are unnecessary? We optimize license costs.
  • Process Efficiency: We reduce labor costs by automating manual work and digitizing repetitive tasks.

What's the Result?

You get the same service at lower cost. Or more output with the same budget. Either way, you win.
services.problemsTitle: Why Your Technology Budget Is Out of Control
services.problemsSubtitle: What successful businesses have in common: They solved these problems.

problems.title: Paying for Unused Licenses
problems.description: You're paying for 100 software licenses but only 40 people actively use it. Multiply this across multiple tools and you're wasting thousands monthly.

problems.title: Inefficient Infrastructure
problems.description: Maintaining physical servers is expensive. High energy costs, hardware upgrades, IT staff time—cloud solutions can cut these costs by 40-60%.

problems.title: Manual Work Eating Budget
problems.description: You're paying skilled employees to do repetitive manual tasks that could be automated. Their time is expensive and could be better spent on strategic work.

problems.title: Technology Sprawl
problems.description: Different departments bought different tools that do similar things. You have 5 communication tools, 3 project management systems, and duplicate functionality everywhere.

services.name: Product and Project Development
services.summary: Have an idea but don't know how to bring it to life? We turn your idea into a real product.
services.description:
Turn Your Idea into Reality

Maybe you have a mobile app idea. Maybe you're thinking of a platform to solve a problem in your industry. Maybe you're designing a new digital service for your customers. There's an idea but how to do it is unclear.

That's where we come in.

How Do We Work?

  • Idea Development: You describe the idea, we detail it together. What features, who will use it, how it should work—we clarify these.
  • Technical Design: We determine the right technologies, architecture and solution path for your idea. Mobile or web? Cloud or on-premise? What integrations are needed?
  • Step-by-Step Development: We build from scratch. But instead of a big launch, we move in small steps. First version is released, tested, feedback is gathered, improved.
  • Launch Support: It doesn't end with building. We're with you on how to use, promote and scale the system.

Who Is It For?

Entrepreneurs, professionals with business ideas, companies that want to launch their own digital product. If you have an idea and think 'how do I build this?', you're in the right place.

Example Projects

Education platforms, booking systems, industry-specific solutions, mobile apps, e-commerce platforms, SaaS products...
services.problemsTitle: Why Your Great Ideas Stay Just Ideas
services.problemsSubtitle: What successful businesses have in common: They solved these problems.

problems.title: Don't Know Where to Start
problems.description: You have a brilliant idea but no technical background. Should you hire developers? Use no-code tools? Outsource to an agency? The options are overwhelming.

problems.title: Budget Uncertainty
problems.description: You have no idea how much it will cost to build your product. Quotes range from $10K to $500K. Without proper scoping, you risk overspending or getting poor quality.

problems.title: Technical Complexity
problems.description: Mobile or web? Which programming language? What database? Cloud hosting? These technical decisions are critical but you lack the expertise to make them.

problems.title: Afraid of Failure
problems.description: What if you invest months and money into building something nobody wants? Without proper validation and an iterative approach, you risk building the wrong thing.
